body.value:
Oleksandr is one of our Drupal Developers. His interest in high technologies has its roots in childhood. He decided to major Computer Science at the age of 16 and he hasn’t stopped continually evaluating and upgrading his skills so that he stays at the cutting edge of web development. His interest grew into profession. Oleksandr has master degree in Computer Science and proven wide range of experience in working with modern technologies for building the best solutions for our customers. 

He is working with Drupal from 2011. In order to increase his knowledge and keep his skills up to date he regularly visits DrupalCamp and DrupalCafe where he discusses and shares his experience with other members of community. In 2015 he became Acquia Certified Developer. 

As a member of a team he took part in large and complex projects from various business fields (chemicals and pharmaceutical industries, production of building materials and international construction companies, luxury cosmetics and fashion brands, education projects). All these projects were high-loaded and included very unique types of content structuring and presentation. He developed the architecture and content migration for the projects with a large amount of data.

Oleksandr is a good team player and can perform a wide range of tasks. In his work he is customer-oriented. He likes challenges and solving complex problems. He is interested in mastering innovative tools for problem resolution. His aim is to find optimal solutions that are easy to support in future and convenient to use for the customer.

When Oleksandr is not programming he likes traveling, playing table-tennis and other outdoor activities. He is always opened to everything new in work and in daily life.
